meanings.definition: The state or quality of being a dude.
meanings.sent1: His dudeness was evident in his laid-back attitude.
meanings.sent2: The dudeness of his outfit was impressive.
meanings.sent3: She admired his dudeness and wished she could be as cool.
meanings.sent4: His dudeness shone through like a beacon of chillness.
meanings.sent5: The dudeness of the party was contagious, making everyone relax.

meanings.definition: The characteristics or qualities associated with being a dude.
meanings.sent1: The dudeness of his style was unmatched.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the dudeness of his sense of humor.
meanings.sent3: His dudeness made him the life of the party.
meanings.sent4: The dudeness of his personality was magnetic.
meanings.sent5: His dudeness was like a cool breeze on a hot day, refreshing and welcome.
